casebody.data:
F. S. WHEELER, et al., v. WALTER R. TREFTZ 22 So. (2nd) 224

January Term, 1945

May 22, 1945 Division B Carey & Harrison and C. I. Carey, for appellant. Clair A. Davis, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

The decree of the court below was accompanied by a clear and cogent opinion which we deem to be sound and correct, rendering unnecessary any opinion by this Court. The decree is accordingly

Affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BROWN, BUFORD, ADAMS and SEBRING, JJ., concur. THOMAS, J., dissents.
